description: {'Location': ['The Arko Bukit Town Hotel is located in the heart of Phuket, Thailand, on 3/51 Taling Chan Road, Tald Yay, Ming, Phuket 83000.'], 'Facilities and services:': ['External pool: The hotel includes an external pool.', 'Restaurant: Serves various cuisine.', 'Free Wi -Fi: Available throughout the hotel.', '24 hours reception office: to serve guests at any time.', 'Dry cleaning services and laundry: available for guest convenience.'], 'Rooms': ['The hotel contains 34 rooms equipped with: air conditioning, smart TV with digital channels and a private bathroom with a shower, free bath supplies, hand, warehouses inside the room, work office, free packed water, daily cleaning service'], 'Tourist places': ["Old Phuket: It is about 10 minutes' walk, and is famous for its historical streets and local restaurants.", 'Weekly weekend market: It is a short car, and it is a great place to experience local cuisine and shopping.', "Central Festival Phuket Shopping Center: It is about 15 minutes' drive away, and offers a variety of stores and restaurants."]}

name: Pacific Club Resort
description: {'Location': ["The Pacific Club Resort is located in the Karon Beach area in Phuket, Thailand, about 10 minutes' walk from the beach."], 'Facilities and services:': ['Skypool: A surface swimming pool provides a 360 -degree panoramic view of the surrounding area.', 'Saneha Gardens: Sanha Gardens: It serves luxurious international cuisine at reasonable prices.', 'Spa and wellness: The resort includes a spa serving massage sessions, pedicure, and Fassal, as well as a herbal sauna and a jacuzzi basin with a waterfall.', 'Fitness Center: Equipped with free weights and cardio devices, compared to the largest hotels in Phuket.', 'Additional services: The resort provides free Wi -Fi, a safety system with electronic switches, and airport transportation services for an additional fee.'], 'Rooms:': ['Deluxe Rooms: Equipped with a King or Quinn beds, microwave, and fridge/freezer.', "Studio Wings: It contains a King's size bed, a comfortable sofa, a wet bar with microwave and a space to store snacks, as well as a large balcony.", 'One bedroom wings: apartment style units with large balconies, living rooms, wide storage spaces, and a small kitchen.', 'Wings of two bedrooms: apartment style units with large balconies, living rooms, and small kitchens with wide storage spaces.'], 'Tourist places': ['Karon Beach: It is about 10 minutes on foot, and it is known for its white sand and clear waters.', 'Karon Park: It is located near the resort and provides green spaces for relaxation.', 'Caron Market: The perfect place to experience local cuisine and buy souvenirs.']}
short_description: Pacific Club Resort in Phuket offers Sky Ball, Spa, luxury restaurant, and panoramic views, near Karon Beach.

description: {'Location': ["The Sinai Bukit - S -Extra Plus Hotel is located on the quiet Koh Siri Island, 7 minutes' walk from Siri Bay Beach."], 'Facilities and services': ['External pool: The hotel includes an external pool that provides picturesque sea views.', 'Fitness Center: Equipped with the latest sports devices to maintain exercise routine.', 'Sind Spa: Provides massage and body care treatments in a calm atmosphere.'], 'Rooms': ["Studio villa with King's bed with a private pool: an area of \u200b\u200b59 square meters, suitable for couples.", 'A twin studio villa with a private pool: an area of \u200b\u200b59 square meters, contains two single beds.', 'Villa deluxe with a private pool: 99 square meters, provides more space and additional amenities.', 'Duplex Villa with a private pool: an area of \u200b\u200b185 square meters, consisting of two floors and suitable for families or groups.'], 'Tourist places': ['Koh Siri Temple: It is about 3 minutes by car, which is a historical Buddhist temple.', 'Ratsada Pass: About 3.9 km, a starting point for marine trips and marine tours.', 'Phuket Trek I Museum: It is about 8 minutes by car, providing interactive 3D art galleries.', 'Night Sunday market in Phuket: About 6.9 km, where you can enjoy shopping and taste local cuisine.']}
